        Test value against predicate if value is present.
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate to test value.
        Returns:
        An Opt of None if value does not match predicate, or return same Opt if either value is not present or value matches predicate.

                                                           throws E extends java.lang.Throwable
        Returns the value of this Opt if present, or fail stupidly if value is not present. I recommend to not do things stupidly, you have been warned.

        Returns:
